comment: Additional factors to consider. Homes have much greater square footage now, and vehicles have many, many more features and are more complex now. So this would skew the comparison.
amr:
# ::snt Additional factors to consider. Homes have much greater square footage now, and vehicles have many, many more features and are more complex now. So this would skew the comparison.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / factor
            :ARG1-of (c / consider-02)
            :mod (a / additional))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 (h2 / home)
                  :ARG1 (s / square-
                        :ARG1-of (h3 / have-degree-91
                              :ARG2 (g / great)
                              :ARG3 (m2 / more
                                    :quant (m3 / much))))
                  :time (n / now))
            :op2 (h4 / have-03
                  :ARG0 (v / vehicle)
                  :ARG1 (f2 / feature
                        :ARG1-of (h5 / have-quant-91
                              :ARG3 (m4 / more
                                    :quant (m5 / many)))))
            :op3 (h6 / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 v
                  :ARG2 (c2 / complex)
                  :ARG3 (m6 / more)
                  :time (n2 / now)))
      :snt3 (ii / infer-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / skew-01
                  :ARG0 (t / this)
                  :ARG1 (c3 / compare-01))))
